title: Development of Instructional Design Strategies for Mixed-Age Classroom Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: A course exploring effective math education design methods in multi-grade classroom settings, developing teachable strategies applicable to real educational contexts through blended (online-offline) classes.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more core principles of math education design in multi-age classrooms
Learners can create individualized math lesson plans tailored to multi-grade learner characteristics
Learners can design two or more collaborative math activities that promote cooperative learning in mixed-age environments
Learners can analyze three or more challenges of evidence-based multi-age math education and propose alternatives
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
